property.name: Rules
property.value: When one of your fire creatures wins a battle, you may put this creature from your hand into the battle zone. Whenever one of your other fire creatures battle, you may have this creature battle instead. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. This creature and that creature battle. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your fire creatures battle, until the end of the battle, that creature gets +3000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Guardman If you don't have another Dragon in the battle zone, this creature can't attack. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your fire creatures win a battle, this creature breaks one of your opponent's shields.

card.name: Vibros Heaven, Lord of Dragon Spirits

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your Angel Commands or Dragons. When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all non-light creatures in the battle zone into their owner's shields face down. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a non-evolution light creature that costs 3 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
Rules
Rules
property.value: Sympathy-'Liquid People' When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw up to 3 cards. This creature can't be blocked. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gravity Zero-'If you have 3 creatures in the battle zone that have no abilities Galaxy Vortex evolution—Put on top of 3 of your Liquid People. When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your Liquid People. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if all cards in your mana zone are water, choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Double breaker When you put this creature in battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature and this creature battle. When this creature is put in battle zone during your opponent's turn, put it on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If this creature is discarded by your opponent, you may put it in battle zone. When you put this creature in battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck.Put all Human Baku and Command Dragons from revealed cards in your hand, and put the rest at bottom of your deck in any order. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 7: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 7 or more fire cards in your mana zone, you may put a non-evolution fire creature from your hand other than Gaimusou, Angry Hero into the battle zone. It gets 'speed attacker' and returns to your hand at the end of the turn. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a Dragon, put it into your hand. If its not a Dragon, put it on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may put all cards in your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order. If you do, draw the same number of cards. Charger

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this Dragheart in battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. It battles with the creature equipped with this dragheart. Dragsolution: When one of your Gaial Command Dragons or creature that has 'Gaial' in name attacks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power less than it. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all tapped creatures. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 7: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 7 or more darkness cards in your mana zone, put a non-evolution darkness creature other than Urami Hades, Curse Hero from your graveyard into the battle zone.s Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} This creature can't attack. When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Each of your opponent's psychic creatures gets -5000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponent chooses and discards a card from his hand. Charger

card.name: Diabolos Double Zeta, Temporal Demon Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} This creature can't attack. When your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone due to the ability of a creature, he can't choose this one. Awaken—At the start of your turn, you may choose 3 of your cards in the battle zone and/or your mana zone and put them into your graveyard. If you do, flip this creature.

alternate.name: Devil Diabolos Double Zeta, Ultimate Awakened

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's Light creatures, Water creatures, Darkness creatures, Fire creatures, and Nature creatures. Quattro breaker Release

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this Dragheart into the battle zone, you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand. Dragsolution—At the start of your turn, you may discard 2 creatures from your hand. If you do, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it. Hyperspatial Dragheart

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -1000 power for each card in your graveyard until the end of your turn. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Double breaker Mana Arms 7: When this creature attacks, if you have 7 or more fire cards in your mana zone, choose one:► Put non-weapon card of cost 6 or less from your hyperspatial zone in battle zone.:► If this creature is not equipped with weapon,equip it weapon of cost 6 or less from your hyperspatial zone

property.value: Guardman When you put this creature in battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures.Then, this creature and that creature battle. Mana Arms 7: While you have 7 or more fire cards in your mana zone, this creature gets +4000 power and 'double breaker'.

property.value: Mana Arms 3: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 3 or more fire cards in your mana zone, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your fire Dragons attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has 'blocker'. Dragsolution: When one of your fire creatures attacks, if it's the second fire creature that attacked this turn, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your creatures attack, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has 'blocker'. Double breaker

property.value: When you equip this dragheart,you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature battles with equipped creature. While battling,equipped card gets +3000 power. Dragsolution:When one of your creatures wins battle for second during this turn

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Double breaker During each turn, when you are attacked for the first time, you may have the attacking creature battle with this creature.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy this creature. If you do, choose one of the following.:► Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.:► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 power or less.
